Sample Size Calculation Based on RMST

RMSt.sample.size.Rd

Computes the required sample size per group to achieve a specified power for detecting a given difference in RMST.

Usage

RMSt.sample.size(delta, sigma2, alpha = 0.05, power = 0.8)

Arguments

delta

The effect size (difference in RMST between groups).

sigma2

The variance of the RMST difference estimator.

alpha

Significance level (default: 0.05).

power

Desired power (default: 0.80).

Value

Required sample size per group.

Examples

RMSt.sample.size(delta = 0.5, sigma2 = 0.25, alpha = 0.05, power = 0.8)
